short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly save time by quickly downloading product high-resolution images and save m3u8 files as mp4 4k videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
`One-Click Amazon Product Image、Photo、Picture、Video and Variation Scraper, Export and Download to Excel`.

‘`Free Amazon Image Download - Both Photo & Video`’ is totally FREE extension.

All downloads feature high-definition resources.

Support 21 different Amazon sites in various countries.

# Key Features

✓ Download Images by Variants in a ZIP File
✓ Export Images by Variants to Excel
✓ One-Click Download for All Images in a ZIP
✓ One-Click Export for All Images to Excel
✓ One-Click Export for All Videos to Excel
✓ Instant Video Downloads with One Click
✓ Automatic Image Deduplication

# Is it Free?

Yes, It is completely free to use. You can access all features.

# FAQ

If you have any inquiries, feel free to reach out to our support team at amz.downloadkit@gmail.com .

# Data Privacy

Rest assured, all data processing occurs locally on your computer and never traverses our servers.

# Disclaimer

Amazon is a registered trademark of Amazon Inc. `'Free Amazon Image Download - Both Photo & Video'` is an independent software and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by, or otherwise related to Amazon, Inc., or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries."
